originalText.text: My husband and I have enjoyed working with Adrianne and her other talented instructors at Westside Pilates since 2015.  Adrianne is great at matching instructors with clients to help them meet their unique goals.  Furthermore, Westside Pilates studios are welcoming retreats.  They are spacious and the equipment is always cleaned after each use, so it was easy for Adrianne to ensure that her studios met COVID requirements.  Adrianne and her other instructors have helped my husband and me get relief from injuries and pain and feel stronger.  We look forward to our sessions each week!  HIGHLY recommend!!!

originalText.text: Deceptive - Not on UWS but in Long Island City. Customers are frequently confused and yet ownership does not provide refunds. I signed up for pilates classes on their website and when I showed up to this UWS location (which is 2 blocks away from my apt) they told me it was for the location in Long Island City. I reached out to the company and told them the mix up and they refused to give me a refund for the package I bought. So now I’m stuck with a Pilates package that’s completely out of the way to get to. The owner is not understanding and would rather make money than be understanding to a customers mishap.

originalText.text: Westside Pilates is an extraordinary experience.  The personnel is fantastic and the studio space is clean, inviting while the equipment is kept in top working order.  I was delighted by the expertise of the trainers and lessons are planned with each client's specific needs in mind.  Adrienne runs a superb outfit and she is thoughtful, caring and friendly to both her staff and her clients.  I cannot recommend this more highly.  I only wish I could afford to go every day.  It is food for the body and a feast for the spirit!

originalText.text:
Working with Adrianne at Westside Pilates has been wonderful. I have been there since September 2013. Over this time, my core muscle strength has been developing nicely.This is helping me control my scoliosis. Now I no longer wobble when I walk and I can go up and down stairs with confidence. All my friends and family are commenting on how great I'm looking. It is very cheering to get these compliments.

Adrianne is very thorough while at the same time very gentle in her approach. She allows me to control what I do and how much I do. When she sees I need a push to accomplish more, she is very subtle about it, carefully choosing the moment when she sees that I am ready.

The Westside Pilates studio is a pleasant place to exercise in, too. It is always clean and orderly. Appointments are always on time. I find the atmosphere there very calming.

originalText.text: My husband and I have been working with Adrianne for almost a year. We were thrilled to see her open her own studio after working with her at different studios around the city. Westside Pilates is a beautiful space with gorgeous new equipment that is a pleasure to workout on! She takes her time with us during each session. At times, I think she knows us better than we know ourselves! Adrianne has a ton of wellness knowledge and has been instrumental in making positive changes in our life. We can't imagine our week without a session at Westside Pilates! What a pleasure to have on the Upper West Side!
